channel.title: DUDE SOMEONE HELP OMFG NO ONE HELP"S ME LEGITELY! still need help!
channel.description:
OK I HAVE POSTED THIS 3 TIMES AND ALL I GET IS BEGINERS MOST DONT KNOW WHAT THEY ARE DOING!
ALL I AM ASKING: can someone help me portforwad..... take 5-15 mins of your free time that youll prob waste just browsing these forums helping noobs that arent trying to host a fully eco server that has no custom shops only all rs shops...........
My Problem: I followed the steps on portforward.com.... MY router: Linksys WRT54G2 I need someone to simply PLEASE teamview me and portforward for me because obviously i am a hosting fuck up......
IF SOMEONE CAN HELP ME .,.,.,.,., !!!!!THANK YOU!!!!!! rep++ w/ <3<3<3<3<3

item.title: DUDE SOMEONE HELP OMFG NO ONE HELP"S ME LEGITELY! still need help!
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Don’t know what to tell you. Just keep trying and rechecking to make sure you did everything correctly. Sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: DUDE SOMEONE HELP OMFG NO ONE HELP"S ME LEGITELY! still need help!
item.dc:creator: @codyskate5021 codyskate5021
item.description:
@codyskate5021 wrote:

The Wanderer:

ISP != router. Verizon is a Internet Service Provider. Verizon supplies internet, linksys supplies router. Cincinnati bell supplies me internet, linksys is my router. I can’t portforward.

hmmm clear is who provides but when i portforward on my clear router it works i have 2 router setups one for phone and one for internet both from the same provider… my dad is a helicopter pilot for quest and work’s on the intena’s and he had one of his work buddies call me and have me go through all this with him… over all that its just the gay ass router setup (on the computer not in my room)

Read full topic

ugh well its linksys they always allow portforwarding my friend had the same router last year and he hosted his server but it’s 1:18 am here i cant call him its prob 2:30 am where he lives now
